Trade/Device Name(s): Gold Standard Diagnostics Borrelia burgdorferi IgG ELISA Test Kit
Analyte(s): IgG antibodies to Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Gold Standard Diagnostics Borrelia burgdorferi IgG ELISA Test Kit for qualitative detection of Lyme disease antibodies using ELISA methodology.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to Borrelia burgdorferi in human serum from symptomatic or suspected patients; for use as a first-tier screening or second-tier confirmation test in standard or modified two-tier Lyme disease testing protocols.
